articles.title: Angel Yeast starts Operating New 11,000-Ton Yeast Protein Production Line to Meet Global Demand for Sustainable Nutrition
articles.author: PR Newswire
org: Protein Nutrition and Flavoring Technology Center
articles.summary: Angel Yeast Co., Ltd. has launched its next-generation yeast protein production line in Yichang, Hubei, producing 11,000 tons of high-purity yeast protein annually.  The facility will produce AngeoPro, a novel protein, which received innovation awards for its performance and clean taste profile for various applications.

articles.title: Angel Yeast starts Operating New 11,000-Ton Yeast Protein Production Line to Meet Global Demand for Sustainable Nutrition
articles.author: Angel Yeast
articles.summary: Angel Yeast Co., Ltd. has commenced operations at its new yeast protein production line in Yichang, Hubei. The facility boasts an annual capacity of 11,000 tons of high-purity yeast protein, containing over 80% protein. This launch aims to address the increasing global demand for sustainable protein.

articles.title: Kogan taps Oasis nostalgia for Manchester bedding push
articles.author: Natasha Lee
articles.summary: Kogan is launching 'The Manchester Sale,' a limited-time promotion offering a 10% discount on bedding products such as duvets, doona covers, and linen. The promotion aims to encourage shoppers to upgrade their bedrooms with affordable options from Kogan's in-house range, coinciding with Oasis's tour in Australia.

articles.title: If You've Come To The Conclusion That You Are *Not* For The Streets, Here Are 27 Things To Enjoy Your Homebody Life
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: Various new products are introduced, including a portable 120-inch screen, a cooling blanket, a 10-foot USB-C cable, and a bamboo fabric sleep set.  Other products include a slushy maker called Ninja Slushi, a soft-serve maker called Yonanas and a PopLite personal popcorn maker.

articles.title: Wendy's Unveils Limited‑Time Frosty Flavor To Celebrate The Holiday Season
articles.author: Kait Hanson
articles.summary: Wendy's is introducing the Snickerdoodle Cookie Frosty Fusion, a new limited-time Frosty beverage blended with snickerdoodle sauce and cookie crumbles, available in vanilla or chocolate. The company also offers a smoother version called Snickerdoodle Frosty Swirl. This new product is available for a limited time at participating U.S. Wendy's locations.

articles.title: Oddball raises $2 million
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A seed round will fund retail expansion and product innovation.

articles.title: DoubleVerify takes aim at AI slop
articles.author: Natasha Lee
articles.summary: DoubleVerify has launched DV AI Verification, a new suite of tools designed to help advertisers manage AI agents and AI-generated content across various platforms. This suite includes features such as Agent ID Measurement and AI SlopStopper, providing transparency and brand safety in AI-impacted environments. The social version of AI SlopStopper will arrive in early 2026.

articles.title: Republic Bank (Ghana) PLC unveils new marketing campaign ‘Republic Verse: Big Up – Unleash your Potentials!'
articles.summary: Republic Bank (Ghana) PLC has launched a new integrated marketing campaign called 'Republic Verse: Big Up – Unleash Your Potential'. This campaign aims to deliver value across Retail and Commercial, SME, Corporate Banking, Mortgage, Wealth and Pensions, and Digitization with innovative products, personalized services, and transformative experiences.

articles.title: DXC Opens First Client Experience Centre in the Philippines, Expanding Its Presence in Asia to Drive Collaboration and AI Innovation  Nov. 4, 2025 22:00
articles.summary: DXC Technology launched a new Client Experience Centre in the Philippines. The Centre features an AI Incubation Hub focused on developing next-generation AI solutions and an AI-first 24/7 Security Operations Centre.

articles.title: The Brightside: A brand that tells a story
articles.author: Leila Weah
articles.summary: Born By The Bay, a clothing brand, offers products like t-shirts with Maryland blue crabs, camouflage hoodies, and hats with fish and crab designs. The brand aims to represent the Chesapeake Bay through its clothing line.

articles.title: Nomad's magnetic charging stands now support faster 25W rates
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: Nomad has launched updated versions of its Stand One and Stand One Max charging hubs, now supporting the Qi2.2 standard for faster wireless charging. The Stand One includes a second wireless charging pad for AirPods, while the Stand One Max allows horizontal smartphone attachment during Apple Watch charging.

articles.title: AQUADOM USA Unveils the ZEN Thermostatic Shower System – Luxury, Precision, and Modern Design in ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: AQUADOM USA launched the AQUADOM ZEN Shower System. The shower system aims to transform the modern bathroom with its elegance and engineering.

articles.title: 68-year-old Canton Fair gains new momentum
articles.author: Chi Jingyi in Guangzhou
org: 18th Communist Party of China Central Committee
Ningbo New Oriental Electric Industrial Development
articles.summary: The 138th Canton Fair featured new product launches, including commercial intelligent robots from a Shenzhen-based company. The fair also showcased 353,000 smart products and debuted a specialized smart healthcare exhibition zone with surgical robots and wearable technology.  Shenzhen Intelligence.Ally Technology Co Ltd (Allybot) expects a 300 percent year-on-year export growth for the full year.

articles.title: Scentiful, LLC Launches Artisan Aromatics Line to Transform Daily Routines Into Mindful Sensory Rituals
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Scentiful, LLC is debuting with handcrafted small-batch fragrances. The company aims to transform ordinary moments into extraordinary experiences through their fragrances, emphasizing that self-care is essential.

articles.title: I've used vanilla Android for a decade and I regret not installing this launcher sooner
articles.author: Yadullah Abidi
articles.summary: METROV is a new Windows Phone-inspired launcher for Android that brings the Metro aesthetic to Android. The app offers live tiles, action center, widgets and theming system, and is available through a monthly subscription for $1 or a lifetime purchase for $3.5, which includes all new features and updates.

articles.title: Proofed Laundry Review: The Non-Toxic, Plastic-Free Detergent That Actually Works
articles.author: Amanda Lauren
articles.summary: Proofed! has introduced new plastic-free laundry sheets and a stain remover spray. The laundry sheets contain powerful enzymes, are eco-friendly, come in three scents, and work in various water temperatures. The stain remover spray is designed for pre-treating clothes.

articles.title: Pixel 10 Pro Deal: $250 Off Flagship Phone!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10 Pro with advanced AI capabilities powered by the Tensor G5 chip. Key features include Magic Cue, seamless Gemini Live integration, and enhanced computational photography. It also features Qi2 wireless charging and a brighter 6.3-inch OLED display.

articles.title: No need to swipe right. AI is transforming dating apps
articles.author: International New York Times
articles.summary: Larger apps are beginning to introduce their own versions of AI matchmaker services. This development signifies a move by established companies to compete with AI matchmaker startups.

articles.title: Infinix launches its all-new X5W Smart TV nationwide
articles.summary: Infinix has launched the Infinix X5W QLED TV in Pakistan, featuring an AI-driven recommendation engine, AI voice assistant, and a 4K QLED Vivid Display. The TV is available nationwide starting from Rs69,999 and is designed to offer a personalized and intelligent entertainment experience.

articles.title: Galaxi Brands Launches: A Next-Generation Marketplace Empowering Celebrities, Athletes, and Influencers to Create Their Own Products
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Galaxi Brands announced the upcoming launch of its creator-led marketplace, a full-service platform empowering celebrities, athletes, artists, and influencers to create and sell their own consumer products, starting with beverages. Officially launching in the first quarter of 2026, Galaxi Brands is redefining how personal brands enter the consumer goods space by removing traditional barriers to entry and providing a turnkey solution from concept to shelf.

articles.title: Galaxi Brands Launches: A Next-Generation Marketplace Empowering Celebrities, Athletes, and Influencers to Create Their Own Products
articles.author: Biz Ventures
articles.summary: Galaxi Brands announced the upcoming launch of its creator-led marketplace in Q1 2026, empowering creators to develop, manufacture, and distribute their own consumer product lines, starting with beverages. Galaxi Brands provides an end-to-end infrastructure covering product formulation, packaging, compliance, production, logistics, and marketing.

articles.title: Porsche Has A New Patent For Something You Already Do Every Time You're In A Tunnel
articles.author: Chase Bierenkoven
articles.summary: Porsche has patented a "Tunnel Mode" feature for its vehicles that enhances the engine sound experience when driving through tunnels. The system automatically adjusts windows, drive mode, suspension, and exhaust settings for an enhanced audio-visual experience. Conversely, another mode provides noise cancellation for a quieter ride.

articles.title: Perion Expands Into Full DOOH Stack With Launch of New Player Platform
articles.author: WIT Strategy
articles.summary: Perion Network Ltd. has launched the Perion DOOH Player, a new technology product designed as a full-stack operating system for Digital-Out-of-Home (DOOH) and retail media. The platform integrates with Perion's existing ad server, header bidder, and SSP to streamline ad delivery, optimization, and monetization for digital signage and retail media networks.

articles.title: ChatGPT Go subscription now FREE in India for 12 months: Know who is eligible, step-by-step guide\u0026Acirc;\u0026nbsp;to\u0026Acirc;\u0026nbsp;redeem\u0026Acirc;\u0026nbsp;offer
articles.author: DNA India
articles.summary: OpenAI is offering a limited-time promotion of free ChatGPT Go to new users. This promotion introduces users to the ChatGPT Go service.

articles.title: Review: DailyObjects Stack Phone Cases and Accessories for iPhone 17
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: DailyObjects has recently launched a new product or service.

articles.title: Culver's Is Officially Bringing Back a Menu Item Fans Haven't Seen in Years
articles.author: Annie Campbell
articles.summary: Culver's has launched a new menu item called Wisconsin Cheddar Cheese & Mac nationwide. The dish features macaroni coated in Culver's Wisconsin Cheddar Cheese Sauce, topped with shredded cheddar, and is available from November 3rd through December 28th or until supplies last.

articles.title: Interac launches Konek to widen online payment options
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: Interac Corp. has launched a new offering.

articles.title: The Dyson supersonic is my go-to for fast drying – and it's on sale for Black Friday
articles.summary: Dyson offers a £100 discount on its supersonic hair dryer ahead of the Black Friday sale 2025. The promotion indicates an introduction or update of the product in connection to a sales event.

articles.title: How a mother's resilience is redefining Baby Skincare in Ghana with Nkoala
articles.summary: Nkoala, a new Ghanaian baby skincare brand, has launched, focusing on natural ingredients like shea butter and coconut oil. The brand aims to meet the unique needs of African, melanin-rich skin and is available through the brand's website, selected Mothercare shops, and pharmacies across Ghana.

articles.title: British car brand launches 'featherweight' electric vehicle which 'defies convention'
articles.summary: A British brand is preparing to start production of a revolutionary new electric vehicle. The company has unveiled the vehicle with intentions to redefine the sector.

articles.title: Papa Johns Introduces New Grand Papa Pizza
articles.author: Source Staff
articles.summary: Papa Johns launched The Grand Papa, an 18-inch pizza featuring deli-style pepperoni and a three-cheese blend, available for $14.99 starting November 3rd.  They are also introducing the Salted Caramel Blondie dessert on November 10th, priced at $6.99 when paired with another item.

articles.title: This brilliant Microsoft laptop is a third off, and it might be enough to tempt ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Microsoft's Surface Laptop is currently on sale with a third of its original price deducted. This makes it a particularly attractive offer.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland set to sell major Ninja air fryer dupe with top perks
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland has launched the Silvercrest 1000W Hot Air Fryer, a dupe of the popular Ninja brand, offering an affordable alternative at €34.99. The air fryer features six preset cooking programs and a 1.8-liter capacity, cooking from 80°C to 200°C, and includes a three-year guarantee. The range also includes complementary kitchen gadgets.

articles.title: How Google Messages Plans to Integrate the Nano Banana Model
articles.author: Hans India Digital
articles.summary: Google is preparing to launch a new feature called 'Nano Banana' within Google Messages. This feature allows users to remix photos with AI by describing desired changes, and will be accessible via a 'Remix' button in the media picker and preview screen. Google may also include a daily usage limit for the feature, possibly with higher caps for paid Google AI subscribers.

articles.title: Panda Express Had Their Grand Opening In North Topeka
articles.summary: Panda Express launched a new restaurant in North Topeka. This grand opening signifies the introduction of their food service at a new location.

articles.title: Savor San Antonio Flavors: Italian Classics Reimagined at Guillermo's
articles.summary: Guillermo's restaurant has revitalized classic Italian dishes, introducing a modern take on traditional cuisine. Signature dishes include a reimagined lasagna, shrimp scampi with lemon and garlic, osso buco, and tiramisu. The restaurant also offers a curated wine list and live Italian music on select evenings.

articles.title: No-code Platform Knack Announces AI App Builder for Businesses
articles.summary: Knack has launched its AI app builder, allowing businesses to create custom web applications using plain-language prompts. This AI functionality enhances the user experience by enabling users to leverage Knack's no-code capabilities through AI conversations. Knack also announced Next-Gen Apps, offering a modern interface and enhanced design capabilities.

articles.title: No-code Platform Knack Announces AI App Builder for Businesses
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Knack launched its AI app builder, a new no-code platform functionality allowing businesses to create custom web applications using plain-language prompts. Knack also introduced Next-Gen Apps, featuring a modern interface and enhanced design capabilities. The company is focusing on customer outcomes by offering a solution where anyone can describe their needs and receive a live app in minutes.

articles.title: This 3-in-1 egg cooker is a
articles.author: Yahoo Daily News
articles.summary: A new compact gadget simplifies and speeds up breakfast preparation while reducing mess. This product aims to improve the breakfast experience by making it easier and more efficient.

articles.title: DYV in Detroit Debuts Immersive Car Wash in Sterling Heights
articles.author: R.J. King
articles.summary: DYV, a digital media startup, has launched the world's first immersive car wash experience in partnership with Metro Auto Wash. This platform transforms car wash tunnels into sensory-driven media environments, integrating retail, entertainment, technology, and advertising. DYV aims to create a new advertising medium and revenue stream for car wash operators, with broader rollout planned for 2026.

articles.title: AnswerThePublic Launches AI Dashboard to Enhance Strategic Content Intelligence Advantages for Marketers
articles.author: Np Digital
articles.summary: NP Digital has launched a new comprehensive AI Dashboard in its AnswerThePublic platform. This update provides marketers with enhanced insights into audience behavior, intent, and sentiment across various online platforms, including search engines, social media, and shopping. The AI Dashboard helps marketers create content that resonates with audiences across different channels.

articles.title: Why HONOR X7d is the Perfect Companion for Long Rides
articles.author: --Ppa-Color-Scheme
articles.summary: HONOR Philippines launched the HONOR X7d, a water-resistant AI smartphone designed for durability. The phone features drop protection, IP65 water resistance, a 6500mAh battery, and an AI button with customizable functions. It is available nationwide at HONOR Experience and Partner Stores, and online.

articles.title: AnswerThePublic Launches AI Dashboard to Enhance Strategic Content Intelligence Advantages for ...
articles.author: NP Digital
articles.summary: NP Digital launched a new comprehensive AI Dashboard in its AnswerThePublic platform. This dashboard provides a panoramic view of topics across AI models, search engines, social media, and shopping with enhanced user intent and sentiment analysis metrics. The new AI Dashboard helps marketers understand their audience beyond basic keyword research, revealing real-time behavior, intent, and emotions.

articles.title: Sugar 'N Spice Launches New AI Artificial Intelligence E-Commerce Website
articles.summary: Sugar 'N Spice launched a new eCommerce website featuring Nana Spice, an AI-powered avatar that provides recipes and cooking guidance. The website, developed with Cazarin Interactive, aims to connect customers with Sugar 'N Spice's spices and seasonings and celebrate family traditions.

articles.title: Directable Digital Signage Launches New Canva App With Frictionless Signup
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Directable has released a new "Directable Signage Canva application" that allows Canva users to publish to digital screens without a traditional login process. This app is available in the Canva App Marketplace and works with the Canva mobile app, enabling designers to update content from their phones. It streamlines the process of publishing designs from Canva to screens, making digital signage easier and more accessible.

articles.title: This brilliant Microsoft laptop is a third off, and it might be enough to tempt me to switch from Apple
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Microsoft's Surface Laptop is currently on sale with a significant price reduction, offering substantial savings.

articles.title: The New SkyReels Officially Launches
articles.author: Sky Reels
articles.summary: New SkyReels, an AI video creation platform, officially launched on November 4, 2025. The platform, available on web and mobile, offers "one-stop" and "multi-modal" capabilities for users to create professional-grade video content.

articles.title: ScrubaDub Partners with Community Servings: Pumpkin Spice Car Washes & Pies to Help Critically Ill Neighbors!
articles.author: Scruba Dub Auto Wash Centers
articles.summary: ScrubaDub is offering a limited-time Simoniz UltraShine car wash upgrade, featuring a pumpkin spice scent, with every $5 in-store donation. This promotion is part of their partnership with Community Servings for the "Pie in the Sky" fundraiser.

articles.title: Callers Launches "One Brain" Omni-Channel Platform Proving Customer Connection Is the Last Untapped Growth Lever for B2C Brands
articles.summary: Callers has launched its "One Brain" Omni-Channel platform, unifying Voice AI, SMS, WhatsApp, and Telegram. This platform aims to enhance customer engagement by providing consistent and contextual conversations across all touchpoints, leading to improved customer conversion, retention, and engagement.

articles.title: Top car brand gets go ahead for ‘hands off' AI motorway driving in landmark first – and it's NOT Tesla
articles.summary: BMW is the first car manufacturer to receive approval for a "hands-off" driving feature that utilizes AI technology for motorway navigation. This new feature aligns with recently established UN Regulation for Driver Control Assistance Systems (DCAS).

articles.title: Fair City Soap brings handmade, gentle skincare to town
articles.author: Jace Henderson
articles.summary: Fair City Soap Company relaunched with handcrafted soaps made with goat's milk and free of artificial ingredients. The company offers a wide range of products, including the signature Ouchie Butter, lotions, bath bombs, scrubs, candles, and lip balms, available in seasonal scents and a men's line inspired by popular colognes.

articles.title: Football Manager 26 review: big, bold and ambitious
articles.author: Oli Gent
articles.summary: Sports Interactive (SI) has introduced a new user interface (UI) for its game, designed for both PC and console platforms like Xbox and PlayStation. The UI aims for a pristine look but presents a learning curve for PC veterans while potentially overwhelming console users with its simplicity.

articles.title: AWS announces new sub-sea Fastnet transatlantic data cable between West Cork and US
articles.author: Irish Independent
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has announced a new high-speed service. This announcement directly involves the introduction of a new service by a company.

articles.title: 42 Products You Won't Want To Live Without
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder, designed to matte-ify skin while maintaining its natural glow. Clinique launched Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Pink Honey, offering a lightweight, buildable tint. Catrice released "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, a tinted concealer with hyaluronic acid and shea butter. Good Molecules launched Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, formulated with hyaluronic acid and caffeine to reduce swelling and puffiness around the eyes.

articles.title: Composable CDPs And The Future Of AI-Powered Marketing
articles.author: Tejas Manohar
articles.summary: Hightouch offers a composable CDP that activates insights directly from the data warehouse, eliminating costly replication and reducing maintenance burdens. This approach allows marketers faster access to information for AI-powered tasks such as personalization and campaign orchestration, grounded in real-time customer context.

articles.title: Moto G67 Power Price in India Revealed Ahead of Launch on November 5: Check Specifications and Features
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Moto g67 Power smartphone in India on November 5, 2025, priced at INR 14,999. The phone features a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, a 6.7-inch display, a 7,000mAh battery, and a 50MP Sony LYT-600 primary camera.

articles.title: Introducing Express: The Conversational Data Engineering Platform to Simplify the Creation of Complex Data Workflows for AI Applications
articles.summary: Nexla has launched Express, a new AI-powered conversational data engineering platform designed to simplify data preparation and integration for users of all technical levels. Express enables users to describe their data needs in natural language, and it automatically finds, connects, and prepares the necessary data.

articles.title: Canadian Period Care Company Ranks Among Top 20 Fastest-Growing Companies in Canada
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: joni, a Canadian B Corp-certified period care company, is launching joni period underwear. The launch makes joni the only Canadian brand to offer both disposable and reusable period care options. This expansion aligns with their mission to make period care equitable, sustainable, and accessible.

articles.title: Nextbase Introduces New Vehicle Accessory as a Service (VaaS) Offering, the Turnkey Accessory Solution to Enable Differentiation and Growth for Global Vehicle Manufacturers, with Mazda USA Collaborati
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nextbase is launching a new Vehicle Accessory as a Service (VaaS) offering. Mazda USA is collaborating with Nextbase as a trusted dash cam partner.

articles.title: DXC Opens First Client Experience Centre in the Philippines, Expanding Its Presence in Asia to Drive Collaboration and AI Innovation
articles.author: DXC Technology Company
articles.summary: DXC Technology launched a new Client Experience Centre in the Philippines. This center features an AI Incubation Hub for developing AI solutions and an AI-first Security Operations Centre for threat monitoring, showcasing DXC's commitment to AI-powered services.

articles.title: Reddit user's ‘I broke Zomato's AI customer service' post goes viral
articles.summary: Zomato launched an AI-powered customer service named "Nugget AI" to assist users. However, a user reported a frustrating experience after trying to cancel an order and not being able to communicate effectively with the AI, which generated criticism regarding the system's effectiveness.

articles.title: 'I tried Meaco's new dehumidifier that dries clothes - and it's a game-changer'
articles.author: newsdesk@devonlive.com
articles.summary: Meaco launched the DD8L Pro Desiccant Dehumidifier, which features a dedicated laundry mode and can be controlled via the Meaco app. The dehumidifier uses heat, airflow, and automation to dry clothes quickly and includes a Smart Energy Mode for efficient operation. It is available for purchase on Meaco's website, B&Q, and Amazon for £259.99.

articles.title: Innovative Eyewear Unveils Four New Lucyd Armor® ChatGPT-enabled Smart Safety Glasses & New ANSI Certification
articles.author: Innovative Eyewear
articles.summary: Innovative Eyewear, Inc. has launched four new variants of its Lucyd Armor smart safety glasses. These glasses, first introduced in October 2024, combine AI and Bluetooth functionality with safety features and are the company's top selling frame.

articles.title: Meet NEO: The $20,000 humanoid robot ready to take over your household chores
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: 1X Technologies is launching NEO, a consumer-ready humanoid robot designed to live in homes and assist with various tasks. NEO, available for pre-order in late 2025, can autonomously navigate living spaces, respond to voice commands, recognize objects, and remember tasks, offering a vision of domestic assistance. It is priced at $20,000 or a subscription of $499 per month (estimated minimum six months) for early adopters.

articles.title: Reimagining SDLC With Agentic Software Engineering
articles.author: Josh Scriven
articles.summary: Neudesic's Josh Scriven discusses the introduction of 'agentic software engineering', a new approach using AI code-assist tools to improve software development. This involves building a contextual knowledge base from an organization's backlog and architectural diagrams to help speed up development, reduce rework, and maintain code consistency.

articles.title: Solera Launches Intelligent ShopCentral Platform to Transform Auto Repair Shop Operations
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Solera launched ShopCentral, a cloud-based enterprise-scaled operating system for automotive repair shops. ShopCentral integrates customer communication, scheduling, parts pricing, and billing into a unified platform. The unveiling occurred at the SEMA/AAPEX Show 2025 in Las Vegas.

articles.title: The Best Way To Wash Smelly Gym Clothes
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Nike advises turning gym clothes inside out before washing to maximize cleaning effectiveness by targeting bacteria-ridden surfaces. They also suggest airing out gym clothes promptly after workouts to prevent mold and odors. Further, Nike recommends a vinegar soak for particularly smelly clothes.

articles.title: Diffblue's Latest Innovations in Unit Test Generation Deliver 20x Productivity Advantage Versus AI Coding Assistants
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Diffblue announced the release of the next generation of Diffblue Cover, which aims to provide automated, high-quality unit test generation. A benchmark study supporting this release shows Diffblue's reinforcement learning approach is 20x more productive than LLM-based coding assistants like Claude Code and GitHub Copilot.

articles.title: Parker: Taza Park West welcoming Walmart Supercentre to Tsuut'ina Nation land
articles.author: David Parker
articles.summary: Walmart Canada is introducing a 100,000-square-foot Supercentre as an anchor tenant in Taza Park West. The construction is expected to begin next spring and the opening is expected in the fall of 2027. This development is part of Walmart Canada's $6.5 billion investment in Canada.

articles.title: A Gift for Every Type of Wife
articles.author: Tembe Denton-Hurst
articles.summary: L'Oréal offers a five-minute lamination hair mask that receives high praise. Mackenzie-Childs introduces a new colorway, sparking potential interest. Chinya's three-mode foamer is highlighted for crafting hot chocolates and lattes.

articles.title: The Alternative Bank backs infrastructure development in Oyo
articles.author: Modestus Anaesoronye
org: Oyo State Signage and Advertisement Agency
articles.summary: The Alternative Bank is dedicated to enhancing infrastructure and the environment in Oyo State. They offer tailored products for education, e-commerce, MSMES, vehicle financing, housing financing, and equipment financing, reflecting their wealth creation philosophy. They presented safety equipment and branded materials to OYSAA.

articles.title: M&S Targets New Generation Of Shoppers With TikTok Shop Debut
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) launched its official TikTok Shop as a pilot project to reach new audiences. The shop features exclusive bundles, promotions, live beauty demos, and styling sessions. Initial offerings include curated beauty products, home fragrances, and popular items already trending on TikTok.

articles.title: XOD Introduces 'Aesthetics on Demand' Model, Transforming How Medical-Aesthetic Services Are Delivered Worldwide
articles.author: Ethan Lin
articles.summary: XOD Aesthetic on Demand is launching a portable, technology-driven platform and a range of FDA-cleared aesthetic devices (Breeze, WonderTouch, Diogo, Zelusso, and Silkro systems) designed for use beyond traditional clinics. This 'Aesthetics on Demand' model aims to provide mobility, affordability, and scalability, enabling practitioners to perform treatments across multiple sites or at client venues.

articles.title: BMW F450 GS unveiled as a lightweight adventure bike
articles.author: Business Day
articles.summary: A mid-range model will expand the GS family and is scheduled to arrive in South Africa in 2026. This indicates the launch or introduction of a new product within the GS line.

articles.title: KFC launches new menu in time for Netflix's Stranger Things release
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: KFC is launching a new menu inspired by Netflix's 'Stranger Things' on November 10, featuring the 'Stranger Things Burger' for £7.99 and 'Stranger Things Wings' for £3.99. The menu will be available nationwide in KFC restaurants and via delivery services until January 4.

articles.title: Perion Launches DOOH Player, Completing the Full-Stack Marketing Operating System for DOOH and Retail Media
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perion Network Ltd. has launched the Perion DOOH Player, a new solution for Digital-Out-of-Home (DOOH) and Retail Media. This platform is designed to drive operational scale and create new revenue opportunities by unifying ad delivery, optimization, and screen management into a single platform. The Perion DOOH Player integrates with Perion's existing Ad Server, Header Bidder, and SSP.

articles.title: Woof Gang Advances Fully Integrated Technology Solutions to Give Full Control to the Pet Parents and Drive Tech-Enabled Franchise Growth
articles.author: Woof Gang Bakery
articles.summary: Woof Gang Bakery & Grooming launched its first mobile app for iOS and Android to provide a faster and more connected experience for pet parents and store owners. The app enables customers to book and manage grooming appointments, integrates with the company's systems, and includes plans for AI-powered features like a chatbot and personalized recommendations in 2026. This new app provides a tool for franchisees and aims to enhance the relationship between Woof Gang store owners and consumers.

articles.title: Woof Gang Advances Fully Integrated Technology Solutions to Give Full Control to the Pet ...
articles.author: Woof Gang Bakery
articles.summary: Woof Gang Bakery & Grooming has launched its first mobile app for iOS and Android. The app allows customers to book, manage, and confirm grooming appointments. Future updates for the app, expected in early 2026, include AI-powered features like a smart chatbot and personalized service recommendations.

articles.title: Perion Launches DOOH Player, Completing the Full-Stack Marketing Operating System for DOOH and Retail Media
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perion Network Ltd. launched the Perion DOOH Player, a next-generation solution completing the company's full-stack technology for Digital-Out-of-Home (DOOH) and Retail Media. The solution aims to drive operational scale and recurring revenue opportunities.

articles.title: StoryOne Launches AI-Powered Story Editor to Revolutionize Non-Fiction Publishing
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: StoryOne has launched its AI Story Editor, a new product aimed at revolutionizing non-fiction book creation. This AI-powered platform enables users to create fact-checked books in approximately one hour, significantly faster than traditional publishing methods. Vodafone Germany's Chief Innovation Officer highlights how StoryOne's AI functions reinvent the book writing process.

articles.title: Old Mutual Foundation launch Technovation Hackathon
articles.author: Guest Contributor
articles.summary: The Old Mutual Foundation launched the Old Mutual Technovation Hackathon, inviting participants to create self-service solutions for Old Mutual customers. The initiative aims to empower entrepreneurs by developing working prototypes that address customer journeys and contribute to Old Mutual's digital transformation, featuring a total of N$100,000 in prize money.

articles.title: Scapia and Federal Bank roll out family add-on cards, unveil travel shopping platform
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Scapia introduced Scapia Store, a new product from the company.

articles.title: Vantage X Debuts with a New Era of Smarter Luxury, Bringing Exclusive Access and Elevated Living Within Reach
articles.author: Vantage X
articles.summary: Vantage X announced the launch of its luxury lifestyle membership. This membership combines access, privileges, and savings across a network of world-class brands.

articles.title: Don't buy a refrigerator if it doesn't have this essential feature
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: New refrigerators now come with frost-free technology, which includes built-in fans and heat elements to circulate cool air and melt away ice. This technology eliminates the need for manual defrosting, maintains even temperature, and prevents freezer burn, preserving food taste and nutrition.

articles.title: Jones Soda Launches Mary Jones ZERO, "Skip the Hangover, Keep the Fun: Mary Jones ZERO Sugar Hits Shelves"
articles.author: Jones Soda Co
articles.summary: Jones Soda Co. launched Mary Jones ZERO Sugar, Zero Calorie craft sodas. These sodas aim to provide a guilt-free lift for consumers during the holiday season.

articles.title: Here's why you don't need to spend £150 on a hot chocolate maker
articles.author: Lars Stannard
articles.summary: Hotel Chocolat has released a new version of their Velvetiser hot chocolate machine, called the 'ALL-NEW' model. This new version features a chocolate milk function and the ability to froth cold milk, differentiating it from the original Velvetiser.

articles.title: Netcracker Named a Leader in IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Customer Experience Platforms for Telecom
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Netcracker Technology has been positioned as a Leader in the IDC MarketScape for Worldwide Customer Experience Platforms for Telecommunications 2025. Netcracker's Intelligent Customer Experience redefines customer experience through AI-powered personalization, a seamless omnichannel experience, and a unified commerce foundation which is part of Netcracker's BSS portfolio.

articles.title: The future is calling: How ASAPP is redefining customer experience
articles.author: ASAPP USA TODAY
articles.summary: ASAPP introduced GenerativeAgent, an AI-native platform designed to deliver personalized customer experiences and improve contact center efficiency. The platform offers features like dynamic reasoning, API orchestration, live data integration, and real-time decision-making. Enterprises using ASAPP have observed benefits such as reduced labor costs and enhanced operational efficiency.

articles.title: Netcracker Named a Leader in IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Customer Experience Platforms for Telecom
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Netcracker Technology is recognized as a Leader in the IDC MarketScape for Worldwide Customer Experience Platforms for Telecommunications. Their AI-driven customer experience solution aims to help telecom operators monetize their 5G infrastructure and launch personalized digital offerings. This solution includes features like AI-powered personalization, seamless omnichannel experience, and a unified commerce foundation to boost customer loyalty.

articles.title: Cognizant adopts Anthropic's Claude; to drive AI transformation
articles.author: DHNS
articles.summary: An IT services firm is planning to align its software engineering and platform offerings with Anthropic capabilities. These capabilities include Claude for Enterprise, Claude Code, the Model Context Protocol (MCP), and the Agent SDK. This suggests a potential service launch or update incorporating AI technologies.

articles.title: The Subtle Revolution Reshaping D2C Marketing
articles.summary: Rainwater Labs has launched its Agentic AI Growth Platform, designed for D2C marketing. The platform automates marketing campaign creation and optimization, offering features like competitor analysis, audience targeting, and ad creation. It aims to provide brands with more control, transparency, and efficiency in their marketing efforts.

articles.title: This beauty advent calendar lets you sample the best brands while saving hundreds on skincare, haircare and more
articles.author: EMILY SCRIVENER
articles.summary: Allbeauty is launching the 12 Days of Christmas Advent Calendar, priced at £79.95 and containing 15 premium beauty products worth over £360. The calendar includes skin saviors, fragrances, haircare heroes, brightening cleansers, and a candle, designed to enhance self-care routines.

articles.title: Xinjiang stir-fried rice noodles capture domestic market, eye global expansion
articles.summary: Huaxiaoxiao, operated by 4Youngs, launched its 22nd front-end warehouse in Xinjiang and plans to build a global flagship store and R&D center dedicated to Xinjiang cuisine. Other brands like Mizige are also expanding, while Xinjiang Xierdan Food Co., Ltd. is scaling up production of rice noodle sauces to meet growing demand.

articles.title: 32 Things That'll Help You Finally Fix All The Stuff You've Been Ignoring Around The House
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: Slobproof introduced refillable multi-surface touch-up paint pens to effortlessly fix scratches and nicks on walls, doors, and cabinetry.  Also, Amazon is selling a Levoit air purifier which quietly zaps dust, pet dander, and mystery particles for breathing cleaner, fresher air.

articles.title: BLU Bold N4 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: BLU announced the launch of the BLU Bold N4 smartphone in Q4 2025. The 5G-ready phone features a Li-Po 5000 mAh battery with 66W wired charging, a 6.78-inch AMOLED display, a MediaTek Dimensity 7300X processor, and a triple rear camera system (50MP + 8MP + 8MP).

articles.title: Global cleaning tech brand BISSELL makes its SA debut
articles.author: Sponsored Content
articles.summary: BISSELL, in partnership with Legend Housewares, is launching its floorcare appliances in South Africa, introducing products like CrossWave, SpotClean, and Upright Carpet Cleaners. This launch marks a significant expansion for BISSELL, bringing its cleaning solutions to the South African market.

articles.title: After iPad, Apple Watch to get standalone WhatsApp messenger soon
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: WhatsApp launched a standalone application earlier this year. The application's launch experienced a prolonged delay.

articles.title: Opening date announced for Lidl's 44th store in Northern Ireland
articles.author: Sophie Mclaughlin
org: Baby Bank at Joanmount Methodist Church
articles.summary: Lidl is opening its 44th store in Northern Ireland, specifically a new store in North Belfast, representing a £5m local investment. The redeveloped outlet features a modernised concept design with an expanded product range, improved energy efficiency, and sustainability features.

articles.title: iOS 26.1 Will Allow You to Dim the Transparency of Liquid Glass
articles.summary: Apple introduced 'Liquid Glass' at WWDC 2025, which will be integrated with iOS 26 in September. This new feature aims to give iPhones and iPads a minimalist and transparent appearance, simulating the qualities of glass.

articles.title: DailyObjects Stack Phone ecosystem review: Modular phones might still be a dream, but modular accessories are not
articles.author: Nandagopal Rajan
articles.summary: DailyObjects has launched the DailyObjects Stack phone ecosystem, a modular accessory system featuring grips, wallets, stands, and lanyards that use a Lego-like stack-and-lock mechanism. The ecosystem is currently available for new iPhones, with cases priced around Rs 1,499, color plates starting at Rs 799, grips at Rs 1,499, and wallet stands at Rs 2,999.

articles.title: Apple launches web version of App Store: How to access
articles.summary: Apple has launched a web version of its App Store, accessible at apps.apple.com. This new platform allows users to explore app categories across all Apple devices, offering a redesigned interface for browsing and searching apps. While users can browse and share apps, direct downloads are not yet available.

articles.title: Cubot Tab KingKong Mini Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Cubot officially announced the Tab KingKong Mini tablet in September 2025. The tablet features a 10200 mAh battery with 33W wired charging, a 8.68-inch IPS LCD display, a Unisoc T615 processor, 6GB RAM, 128GB storage, a 48MP rear camera, and a 16MP front camera, and runs on Android 15.

articles.title: DXN expands wellness offerings with launch of Lingzhi eggs and butter cookies
articles.summary: DXN Holdings Bhd has partnered with Selasih Aman Sdn Bhd to launch the DXN Lingzhi Egg, a functional food produced from layer chickens fed a diet enriched with Ganoderma. Additionally, DXN has introduced new DXN butter cookies through a collaboration with Global Premium Resources Sdn Bhd (GPR).

articles.title: What Is Rufus Chatbot And Can It Really Generate Additional $10 Billion For Amazon?
articles.summary: Amazon launched Rufus, a shopping assistant chatbot, in August 2025 in India. Trained on Amazon's catalog and web data, Rufus helps customers find products, answer shopping-related questions, and compare items. Amazon CEO Andy Jassy expects Rufus to generate over $10 billion in annual incremental sales.

articles.title: Panasonic, Addessa finish strong at the 2025 Fun Run and Appliance Expo
articles.summary: Panasonic showcased its latest appliances at the 'Addessa x Panasonic Appliance Expo 2025', highlighting features like AI Econavi for refrigerators and AI Smart Wash for washing machines. The company also introduced the MyPanasonic App, which allows customers to manage warranties, schedule maintenance, and access customer service for their new Panasonic products.

articles.title: How Veterinary Care Keeps Your Pets Safe And Strong
articles.author: Dipo Olowookere
articles.summary: Nicotine-free vapes have emerged as a popular alternative to traditional vaping, offering a way to enjoy the sensory experience without the addictive chemical. These devices feature advanced technology, diverse flavors, and are seen as a safer alternative, appealing to health-conscious individuals and those seeking to quit smoking. The demand is growing because consumers are health-conscious and seek lifestyle balance.

articles.title: More families are switching to AI powered washing machines for cleaner clothes in India: Top 10 picks
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: Samsung, Bosch, and IFB have introduced AI-powered washing machines designed for Indian households. These models feature capabilities like AI-driven wash selections, Super Speed modes, and hygiene steam, with specific models and features designed to address common laundry challenges. Key features include adapting to fabric, stains, and schedules.

articles.title: OpenAI ChatGPT Go now available free in India; step-by-step guide on how to get it
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: OpenAI launched a limited-time offer on November 4th. The offer was introduced as promised.

articles.title: Gatorade Rookie Bottle by PepsiCo Design and Innovation Wins Silver in A' Advertising Industry Awards
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: PepsiCo's Gatorade Rookie Bottle, a stainless steel bottle designed for young athletes, has won a Silver A' Design Award in the Advertising, Marketing and Communication Design category. The bottle features a durable, dent-resistant shell, a built-in carrying handle, a leak-proof straw cap and double-wall stainless steel interior for 24-hour insulation, addressing the evolving needs of sports hydration.

articles.title: Gatorade Rookie Bottle by PepsiCo Design and Innovation Wins Silver in A' Advertising Industry Awards
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: PepsiCo Design and Innovation has launched the Gatorade Rookie Bottle, a stainless steel bottle designed for young athletes. The bottle features a durable, dent-resistant shell, a built-in carrying handle, a leak-proof straw cap and double-wall stainless steel interior that provides more than 24 hours of insulation.

articles.title: John Lewis Christmas Advert LIVE: Viewers await festive advert but already aren't happy
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: John Lewis is launching a new Christmas advertising campaign for 2025. The campaign's theme encourages shoppers to 'find the gift' when they can't express their feelings in words.

articles.title: Cisco launches Unified Edge bundle for distributed edge/cloud workloads
articles.summary: Cisco launched Unified Edge, a platform featuring a server chassis and software for managing distributed computing, networking, and storage resources at the enterprise edge or in remote cloud servers. Unified Edge is designed to support AI workloads and newer use cases such as agentic AI, utilizing a modular form factor.

articles.title: ChatGPT Latest Shopping Feature: The Next Frontier of AI-Powered E-Commerce
articles.author: Shikha Kumari
articles.summary: OpenAI is launching new shopping features within ChatGPT, including Instant Checkout powered by Stripe. Razorpay, NPCI, and OpenAI have collaborated to launch India's first AI-native payment experience inside ChatGPT, named Agentic Payments, enabling UPI transactions within the chat interface. These initiatives aim to transform product discovery and purchasing through conversational AI.

articles.title: Germany's REWE Introduces Meal-Preparing AI Robot
articles.summary: REWE has launched its 'Fresh & Smart' campaign, introducing an AI-powered robot that prepares meals on demand. Developed in partnership with Circus SE, the robot offers various meal options, and the pilot project was launched in Düsseldorf Heerdt on October 29. REWE plans to expand testing to other stores in Düsseldorf and Bonn.

articles.title: Save up to £550 on Dyson vacuums, Airwraps, hairdryers & fans this Black Friday
articles.author: Emma North
articles.summary: Dyson has launched its Black Friday sale with deals on products such as the Dyson V15s Detect Submarine™ cordless vacuum (now £599.99), Dyson Airwrap i.d.™ Multi-Styler and Dryer (now £359.99), and the Dyson 360 Vis Nav™ Robot Vacuum Cleaner (now £649.99). Other featured products include the Dyson Purifier Humidify Cool Formaldehyde PH04 Fan (now £599.99), Dyson V11 Extra Vacuum Cleaner (now £349.99), Dyson Supersonic™ Hair Dryer (now £229.99), Dyson Ball Animal Origin Vacuum Cleaner (now £229.99) and Dyson WashG1™ Wet Floor Cleaner (now £399.99).

articles.title: Revolutionizing D2C Marketing: Agentic AI Growth Platform Leads the Charge
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Rainwater Labs is launching its Agentic AI Growth Platform, an AI-powered service for D2C marketing. The platform handles all marketing aspects, from competitor analysis to campaign launch across platforms like Meta and Google, aiming to provide speed, transparency, and measurable results for smaller brands.

articles.title: Shopper sparks outrage with photo of alarming discovery at local thrift store: 'This is what happens when you sell out'
articles.author: Laurelle Stelle
articles.summary: Liquid Death, a company promoting aluminum-canned water as an alternative to plastic bottles, introduced Liquid Death-branded plastic pool floats. This new product has drawn criticism due to its contradiction of the company's anti-plastic mission. While Liquid Death donates to organizations addressing plastic pollution, the introduction of plastic merchandise has been seen as straying from its eco-friendly purpose.

articles.title: New AI Platform launches and revolutionizes the way they tackle marketing, lead generation, CRM's and content creation
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Waltz AI has launched a new single-sourced S.a.a.S. platform, featuring "Walter," an AI assistant, to help businesses with marketing, CRM, webpage design, and lead generation. The platform emphasizes speed and quality, offering a one-stop growth solution for entrepreneurs and agencies looking to scale faster.

articles.title: AdEdge Relaunches 'AdEdge Insights' to Help Marketers Navigate AI's Impact on Google SEO & Ads
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: AdEdge Digital Marketing has relaunched its monthly insights newsletter, featuring a special report on declining Google Ads performance due to AI. The company is also offering a complimentary AI Marketing Health Check through November 2025, providing a performance snapshot and a 30-day plan crafted by senior strategists.

articles.title: Lordhair Kicks Off Black Friday with Deep Discounts and Exclusive Offers
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Lordhair has launched its Black Friday sale, running from November 1 to December 1, offering discounts on all hair systems, including stock and custom options, with savings up to $100 on two systems. Special promotions include discounts on the SuperSkin-V hair system and the antibacterial ZyroSen SuperSkin-V, along with a chance to win a DJI Pocket 2 camera for the customer with the highest spending during the sale period.

articles.title: It is the season when I wake up in the morning and my throat will curl due to the dry indoor air. In..
articles.author: Jeon Jongheon
articles.summary: LG Electronics introduced the 'PuriCare Hydro Essential' humidifier, a premium product priced over 1 million won, emphasizing clean humidification through three-stage water purification, sterilization, and drying. This new model focuses on core humidification functions, differentiating it from previous models that combined humidification and air cleaning.

articles.title: Kraken launches regulated crypto-collateral futures trading in EU
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: Kraken is expanding its European offering. Kraken is introducing a new feature in Europe.

articles.title: Getting AI to do the grocery shopping: It's closer than you think
articles.author: Elizabeth Knight
articles.summary: Walmart is collaborating with OpenAI to develop "agentic commerce," an AI-powered system that anticipates customer needs and manages grocery shopping proactively. This service aims to transform the shopping experience by predicting what customers will want, potentially influencing retailers like Coles and Woolworths to invest in similar AI solutions.

articles.title: Getting AI to do the grocery shopping: It's closer than you think
articles.author: Elizabeth Knight
articles.summary: Walmart is collaborating with OpenAI to develop "agentic commerce," an AI-driven service that predicts customer needs and proactively orders groceries. This new approach aims to transform the shopping experience by anticipating customer requirements and automating the purchasing process.

articles.title: Coastal Carolina vs. Western Michigan
articles.summary: At the 2025 Japan Mobility Show, Toyota unveiled Century, a new luxury brand designed to stand above Lexus. The launch represents a significant expansion into the luxury market segment for Toyota.

articles.title: how Snapchat is redefining engagement in the new era of luxury
articles.summary: Luxury brands like Gucci, Prada, and Miu Miu are utilizing Snapchat's features to introduce and promote their products to Gen Z and Millennial consumers. Gucci used Promoted Places, while Prada and Miu Miu leveraged Bitmoji Fashion for virtual handbag try-ons. Snapchat offers augmented reality, visual communication tools, and conversational advertising formats to help brands transform inspiration into conversion.

articles.title: LG Uplus and AWS Develop Agentic AI to Automate Cloud‑Native Network Software Installation
articles.author: Jung So-yeon
articles.summary: LG Uplus, in collaboration with AWS, has developed a new technology that uses agentic AI to automate the installation of cloud-native network software. This technology reduces installation time by up to 80% and automates tasks such as cloud infrastructure provisioning, device configuration, and troubleshooting.

articles.title: GS Caltex showcases advancements in AI, digital transformation at third Deep Transformation Day
articles.summary: GS Caltex has launched and implemented several AI-powered platforms and services to improve operations and administrative tasks. The company introduced the Operations Optimization Platform (OOP) at its Yeosu plant to analyze real-time data and autonomously adjust refining processes. It also utilizes 164 AI-powered CCTVs for monitoring and has developed the in-house generative AI platform, AIU, to aid in tasks such as summarizing job applicant information.

articles.title: TGL offers tricky putting test; Tors keeping busy
articles.author: GEAN LEONARD
articles.summary: Amazon is introducing Amazon Basics Core Soft golf balls. The new golf balls feature the Amazon smile logo and an alignment side-stamp.

articles.title: Al Ghurair unveils new food ingredients division and landmark investments at Gulfood Manufacturing 2025
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Al Ghurair Foods will debut at Gulfood Manufacturing 2025. Al Ghurair Foods is unveiling a new product or service at the event.

articles.title: Your New Colleague Has No Pulse
articles.author: Dr. Vikas Singh
articles.summary: Klarna has introduced an AI assistant that handles two-thirds of customer service chats. Baidu is embedding agentic AI in logistics and manufacturing processes. JPMorgan Chase is utilizing AI to draft 15% of its legal contracts. These examples demonstrate the practical application and introduction of AI-driven services in established companies.

articles.title: Jake Paul-Gervonta Davis bout is called off
articles.summary: Tylenol, Kleenex, and Band-Aid are being consolidated under one roof in a $48.7 billion consumer brands deal. The AI song generator Udio is offering a brief window for downloads following a settlement with Universal.

articles.title: 34 Products For Anyone Who's Ever Uttered The Words 'I'm Too Old For This'
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article introduces several new products. Some of the new products include Dr. Melaxin "Peel Shot," a K-beauty product for exfoliation, Lumify Eye Drops which reduce redness in eyes, Loops Quiet 2 which are earplugs for noise reduction, Olay Super Serum Body Wash for skin hydration, and Biofreeze's new Dry Stick which is for portable pain relief.

articles.title: TYT Joins Forces with Noble Mobile to Redefine How People Connect and Consume Media
articles.summary: TYT and Noble Mobile have partnered to disrupt the wireless and media industries. Noble Mobile offers a new service, the 'No-Bull' plan, which rewards users with cash back for unused data, incentivizing reduced phone usage. This collaboration aims to challenge corporate power and provide consumers with a fairer deal.

articles.title: The Last Drop's First Tequila Costs $2,300 And Is Limited To 435 Bottles
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: The Last Drop is introducing its 40th release, marking the company's first foray into tequila production. This represents a new product launch for the brand.

articles.title: LG Uplus, AWS Develop Agentic AI Automatic Installation Software
articles.author: Editor
articles.summary: LG Uplus and Amazon Web Services (AWS) have partnered to develop technology that uses agentic AI to automate the installation of cloud-native network software. This new technology is expected to reduce software installation time by up to 80% by automating the process from cloud infrastructure construction to problem-solving, minimizing errors, and reducing the need for manual intervention.

articles.title: Not To Toot My Own Horn, But I've Just Compiled A List Of 28 Of The Best Kitchen Products You've Seen In A While
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: Our Place introduced the Splendor Blender for single-serve smoothies with a to-go lid. Ninja launched the Crispi Air Fryer, an all-in-one cooking and storage system, and the Ninja Slushi maker that can transform any drink into a slushy. EZ Bombs released birria bombs, a seasoning blend for making birria tacos.

articles.title: JJ's Brings Honest Natural Solutions to American Families
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: JJ's, a newly established brand, is launching a comprehensive product line aimed at providing families with trustworthy products. The company focuses on using ingredients with purposeful roles in daily routines.

articles.title: First look at John Lewis Christmas advert for 2025
articles.author: Digitial Reporter
articles.summary: John Lewis launched its 2025 Christmas advert on November 4th, earlier than previous years. The advert focuses on the relationship between a dad and son through music, featuring the song 'Where Love Lives' and a nostalgic journey.

articles.title: NEC and Siemens hook up on industrial robots
articles.author: Eweekly
articles.summary: NEC and Siemens are collaborating to develop a new robot teaching automation product. This product combines NEC's BluStellar and Robot Task Planning digital twin service with Siemens' Process Simulate software for 3D robot simulations.

articles.title: Top Digital Marketing Agency Helps Businesses Take Control of How AI Represents Their Brand
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Woww, a digital marketing agency, has launched new "AI Visibility and Generative Engine Optimization (GEO)" services. These services are designed to ensure a brand's accurate representation and understanding by AI systems, combating misinformation and disinformation. Woww also offers an AI Visibility Audit to help businesses understand and improve how AI perceives their brand.

articles.title: Avoid Rigidity And Drive Innovation By Rewiring Marketing And Comms
articles.author: Sandy Ono
articles.summary: OpenText's EVP Sandy Ono discusses how AI can be a catalyst for behavioral transformation and accelerate change for businesses. AI can be deployed in specific areas of change strategy, for example, deploying an AI chatbot to manage FAQs during a product launch or rebrand. Global retailers can roll out AI-driven personalization engines with the objective of strengthening customer engagement metrics by investing in clean, unified data.

articles.title: Skyhawk Drone Reviews: Do Not Buy Till You Read This
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: Skyhawk Drone launched a new 4K foldable HD drone for online purchase in the United States, Canada, and other countries. The drone has received positive user reviews, though its authenticity is being questioned by some customers due to claims of drop shipping.

articles.title: Evonik Sells Betaines Business in Indonesia to Advance Sustainable Specialties Strategy
articles.author: Chem Analyst
articles.summary: Evonik Industries AG has taken a decisive step.

articles.title: Bruntee Transforms Grandfather's Retirement Dream into Global Family Business Delivering Positive Messages Worldwide
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Bruntee launched a new multigenerational e-commerce platform. The platform aims to honor a family legacy and promote joy and connection among families.

articles.title: ZincFive unveils BC 2 AI battery system for both AI and traditional IT loads
articles.author: PV Magazine
articles.summary: ZincFive, an Oregon-based nickel-zinc battery specialist, is releasing its new nickel-zinc (NiZn) battery cabinet. The new cabinet provides support for high-intensity AI pulses and traditional IT backup.

articles.title: Try new MAI-Image-1 in Bing Image Creator, Copilot Audio Expressions (Microsoft Corporation)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Microsoft has begun launching MAI-Image-1 into select Microsoft products. This includes Bing Image Creator, accessible at bing.com/create, the Bing mobile app, and the Bing search bar. Bing Image Creator is designed to integrate with existing search and creation workflows.

articles.title: This $20K Humanoid Robot Promises to Tidy Your Home. But There Are Strings Attached
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: 1X designed Neo. Neo is a robot. Neo does chores.

articles.title: Giga Computing Announces Worldwide Availability of Its NVIDIA RTX PRO Server
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Giga Computing, a subsidiary of GIGABYTE Group, has launched the GIGABYTE XL44-SX2-AAS1, an NVIDIA RTX PRO Server. The new server integrates the NVIDIA RTX PRO 6000 Blackwell Server Edition and is now available worldwide.

articles.title: AWS announces new Fastnet transatlantic data cable between Ireland and US
articles.author: Irish Independent
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) announced a new high-performance computing (HPC) service.

articles.title: DXC Opens First Client Experience Centre in the Philippines, Expanding Its Presence in Asia to ...
articles.author: Canada Newswire
articles.summary: DXC Technology launched a new Client Experience Centre. This centre leverages talent in the Philippines to focus on AI-powered solutions for clients.

articles.title: Deutsche Telekom and NVIDIA Unveil Industrial AI Cloud to Transform Germany's Industry
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: Deutsche Telekom and NVIDIA have launched the world's first Industrial AI Cloud. This new service aims to revolutionize Germany's industrial sector. The Industrial AI Cloud provides advanced AI capabilities.
